product_name: Innova Disc Golf Champion Valkyrie Distance Driver Disc
long_description: The Innova Champion Valkyrie driver disc is a world record holder for distance. It's a great choice for players seeking great glide and long turnover or tailwind drives. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymer plastics to offer the best combination of grip and durability. The Innova Champion Valkyrie driver disc is PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
